title: Workplace Fitness Improvement Project Through Functional Training

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic physical conditioning (walking/jogging, etc.) and knowledge of simple exercise equipment usage
context.additional_context: A customized training program using digital devices (tablets, wearables) designed to address physical decline caused by prolonged sedentary work among office/administrative staff

learning_goals: Improvement of participants' baseline physical fitness by 20% through strength, flexibility, and endurance assessments within 6 months.

Learners can design functional training programs tailored to three fitness levels (beginner, intermediate, advanced) based on individual fitness assessments, execute them with an 80%+ participation rate over four weeks, and compile training logs and outcome reports.
Cultivation of the ability to analyze exercise data and provide feedback using digital devices (apps, wearable devices).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
